comments.content:
I'd like to know this too.

I've been asked to add "Construction" to Entergy in the same font.

WhatTheFont.com wasn't able to identify it properly.
Somebody has been seriously messing with [Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130551/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/bodoni/). This is kind of a car wreck of a logo.
